hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about AetherMind

general.question: What is AetherMind?
general.answer: AetherMind is an advanced AI platform that helps businesses automate and optimize their operations through intelligent automation and data analysis.

general.question: How do I get started?
general.answer: Getting started is easy! Simply sign up for an account, follow our quick start guide, and you'll be up and running in minutes.

pricing.question: What pricing plans are available?
pricing.answer: We offer several pricing tiers to suit different needs, from individual users to enterprise solutions. Visit our pricing page for detailed information.

pricing.question: Is there a free trial?
pricing.answer: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card required.

technical.question: What are the system requirements?
technical.answer: AetherMind is a cloud-based solution that works on any modern web browser. No special hardware is required.

technical.question: How secure is my data?
technical.answer: We take security seriously. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest, and we follow industry best practices for data protection.
